P35 StoryTime: Learn English with Stories (free LEP Premium Sample) THE BEAR STORY
Sir Gawain and The Green Knight (by Simon Armitage) Poetry Reading
Camp Stabbiwaka by Peter Carlson (Learn English with a Scary Story)
The Escaped Man (Short Story for Learners of English) Vocabulary & Grammar
The Umbrella Man by Roald Dahl (Learn English with a Short Story)

Did Amber really do this? The Lying Game with Amber & Paul [LEP436]

FIND 85 VERB + PREPOSITION Collocations / Improvised Story for Learners of English

The Karate Kid
result.description: Dre, a young boy, finds himself bullied by Cheng, a rebellious kung fu prodigy at his school. However, things change after he befriends Mr Han, a maintenance man, who happens to be a kung fu expert.

result.name: Zathura: A Space Adventure
result.description: Two young brothers find themselves transported into the depths of space while playing a board game. They try their best to find their way back to the Earth.

result.name: Yes Man
result.description: After attending a self-help seminar, Carl decides to say yes to everything in life to let go of his negativity. However, he learns that too much of positivity isn't that great either.

result.name: Spider-Man: Homecoming
result.description: Peter Parker tries to stop Adrian 'The Vulture' Toomes from selling weapons made with advanced Chitauri technology while trying to balance his life as an ordinary high school student.

result.name: Spider-Man: Far From Home
result.description: Peter Parker, the beloved superhero Spider-Man, faces four destructive elemental monsters while on holiday in Europe. Soon, he receives help from Mysterio, a fellow hero with mysterious origins.

result.name: Three Wishes for Cinderella
result.description: Cinderella is living with her evil stepmother and her spoiled stepsister. During a walk in the snow-heavy forest, she meets the kingdom's handsome prince, who is soon going to choose a girl as his bride at the palace ball.

result.name: Aladdin
result.description: Aladdin, a kind thief, woos Jasmine, the princess of Agrabah, with the help of Genie. When Jafar, the grand vizier, tries to usurp the king, Jasmine, Aladdin and Genie must stop him from succeeding.

result.name: Nobody
result.description: Hutch Mansell finds his life changed when a few thieves break into his house. While trying to punish the thieves, he ends up earning the wrath of a crime lord, Yulian, after he attacks his brother.

result.name: Bridge to Terabithia
result.description: A rich city girl, Leslie, and a poor country boy, Jess, create Terabithia, a land of magical beings, and become its rulers. This helps Jess to escape and cope with a tragedy.

result.name: Uncharted
result.description: Victor Sullivan recruits Nathan Drake to help him find the lost fortune of Ferdinand Magellan. However, they face competition from Santiago Moncada, who believes that the treasure belongs to him.

result.name: Now You See Me
result.description: The Horsemen, a group of four street magicians, are chased by FBI agent Dylan Rhodes and Interpol agent Alma Dray after they rob a huge sum of money that belongs to insurance magnate Arthur Tressler.

result.name: Murder On The Orient Express
result.description: After the Orient Express gets derailed by an avalanche, Edward Ratchett is found dead with multiple stab wounds. Detective Hercule Poirot must solve the case before the killer strikes again.

result.name: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
result.description: A man living a dull life dreams up romantic and action-filled scenarios in order to escape from monotony. When his own job is threatened, he sets out on a real romantic and action-packed journey.

result.name: Now You See Me 2
result.description: The Four Horsemen, a group of illusionists, find themselves in Macau, China, planning to pull off a robbery on the orders of a devious technology genius.

result.name: San Andreas
result.description: Following a massive earthquake, Ray, a rescue-chopper pilot, and his estranged wife try to find and save their daughter before another disaster strikes.

result.name: Wonder
result.description: August, a boy who suffers from facial deformity, enters a private school in fifth grade. He endures bullying from his peers but finds a way to overcome them with his friends and family.

result.name: Ford v Ferrari
result.description: Carroll Shelby, an automotive designer, and Ken Miles, a race car driver, join hands to build a trailblazing vehicle and compete against the Ferrari race cars.

result.name: Death on the Nil
result.description: Belgian sleuth Hercule Poirot's Egyptian vacation aboard a glamorous river steamer turns into a terrifying search for a murderer when a picture-perfect couple's idyllic honeymoon is tragically cut short.

result.name: Abduction
result.description: A young man's world turns upside down when he learns that he was adopted as a child. However, just as he tries to confront his family about the matter, he finds himself on the run from mysterious men.

result.name: Mulan
result.description: When her father is unable to join the army due to his old age, Mulan, a young woman, decides to disguise herself as a man and takes his place instead.

result.name: Interstellar
result.description: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

result.name: Free Guy
result.description: Guy lives a seemingly peaceful life as a bank teller. However, an encounter with a pretty but mysterious woman makes him realise that he is a non-playable character in a massive online video game.

result.name: Tower Heist
result.description: A group of hardworking men fall prey to a scam conspired by a wealthy businessman. Furious and desperate for revenge, they come together and plan a heist against him. Will they be able to succeed?

result.name: Jurassic World
result.description: A theme park showcasing genetically-engineered dinosaurs turns into a nightmare for its tourists when one of the dinosaurs escapes its enclosure. An ex-military animal expert steps up to save the day.

result.name: Jurassic World Fallen Kingdom
result.description: After a volcano eruption proves to be a threat for the dinosaurs, Owen and Claire reach the defunct Jurassic World, a theme park, to save the animals from extinction

result.name: Mr. Popper's Penguins
result.description: When Tom Popper's father dies in Antarctica, he inherits six penguins. Tom initially decides to give them away, but his children think they are a birthday present and he is forced to keep them.

result.name: Night at the Museum
result.description: Larry, a night security guard at the Museum of Natural History, gets some help from the exhibits who come alive at night to foil a robbery attempt of a magic tablet and proves that he is not a loser.

result.name: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithson
result.description: Larry, the security guard of the Smithsonian Institution Museum, must gain access to the museum in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.

result.name: The Ron Clark Story
result.description: A restless but gifted young teacher leaves his home in North Carolina to seek adventure and a job in the bright lights and tough schools of New York City. Will he make the difference he dreams of ?

result.name: Jungle Cruise
result.description: Dr Lily Houghton, a researcher, and her brother team up with Frank, a skipper, to locate a mystical tree in the Amazon. However, they are pursued by evil entities lusting after immortality.

result.name: Going in Style
result.description: Joe, Willie and Albert, three lifelong friends, plan to rob the bank that swindled them out of their pension money in order to come through for themselves and their loved ones.

result.name: Father of Invention
result.description: Synopsis. Robert Axle, a New Orleans-based infomercial guru, loses it all when one of his inventions maims thousands of customers. After eight years in a maximum-security prison, Axle is ready to redeem his name and rebuild his billion-dollar empire.

result.name: The Prestige
result.description: Two friends and fellow magicians become bitter enemies after a sudden tragedy. As they devote themselves to this rivalry, they make sacrifices that bring them fame but, with terrible consequences.

result.name: Holes
result.description: Elya Yelnats forgets to repay the gypsy Madame Zeroni. His family is cursed with bad luck for eternity. When Stanley Yelnats IV steals a baseball player's cleats, he is sent to Camp Green Lake.

result.name: The Truman Show
result.description: An insurance salesman is oblivious of the fact that his entire life is a TV show and his family members are mere actors. As he starts noticing things and uncovers the truth, he decides to escape.

result.name: The Book of Henry
result.description: When Henry, a young genius boy, notices that his classmate Christina is being abused by her stepfather, he creates a plan to rescue her.

result.name: The War with Grandpa
result.description: When Peter's grandfather moves in with his family, he is forced to give up his bedroom. Disgruntled, he declares war, forcing the grandfather-grandson duo to try to outwit each other.

result.name: Gladiator
result.description: Commodus takes over power and demotes Maximus, one of the preferred generals of his father, Emperor Marcus Aurelius. As a result, Maximus is relegated to fighting till death as a gladiator.

result.name: The Karate Kid
result.description: Dre, a young boy, finds himself bullied by Cheng, a rebellious kung fu prodigy at his school. However, things change after he befriends Mr Han, a maintenance man, who happens to be a kung fu expert.

result.name: The alchemist
result.description:
"The Alchemist" by Paulo Coelho:
Santiago's journey in search of a hidden treasure provides profound insights into destiny and personal legend.

result.name: The Diary of a Young Girl
result.description:
"The Diary of a Young Girl" by Anne Frank:
Anne Frank's poignant diary recounts her experiences hiding from the Nazis during World War II.

result.name: Eragon
result.description:
"Eragon" by Christopher Paolini:
Embark on an epic fantasy adventure with a young farm boy named Eragon and his dragon, Saphira.

result.name: The Hunger Games
result.description:
"The Hunger Games" by Suzanne Collins:
Join Katniss Everdeen in a dystopian society where teenagers are chosen to participate in a deadly televised competition.

result.name: Mieko and the Fifth Treasure by Eleanor Coerr
result.description:
Mieko and the Fifth Treasure by Eleanor Coerr:
This book is aimed at young native English speakers, so if you’re learning English, the level won’t be so difficult. This book will keep you interested as you’ll learn many interesting things about Japan and its culture.

result.name: Officially Dead by RichardPrescott
result.description:
Officially Dead by RichardPrescott:
When Colin Fenton is offered a large sum of money to carry out a job, he believes it is an easy solution to fix his struggling business. However, the job goes wrong and Colin loses his identity, leaving his wife to try to prove whether he is officially dead.

result.name: The Mouse and the Motorcycle
result.description:
The Mouse and the Motorcycle by Beverly Cleary
Join Ralph, a mouse with a love for adventure, as he befriends a boy and explores the world of humans with a tiny motorcycle.

result.name: The Enormous Crocodile
result.description:
The Enormous Crocodile by Roald Dahl:
Join the Enormous Crocodile on his mischievous quest to eat children, and follow the clever animals who outsmart him.

result.name: The Wind in the Willows
result.description:
The Wind in the Willows by Kenneth Grahame:
Follow the charming adventures of Mole, Rat, Toad, and Badger as they explore the English countryside and face various escapades.

result.name: The Adventures of Frog and Toad
result.description:
The Adventures of Frog and Toad by Arnold Lobel:
Join the delightful Frog and Toad in their heartwarming adventures, showcasing the joys and challenges of friendship.

result.name: The Hardy Boys
result.description:
The Hardy Boys series by Franklin W. Dixon:
Follow the daring adventures of brothers Frank and Joe Hardy as they solve mysteries and face thrilling challenges.

result.name: The Mysterious Benedict Society
result.description:
The Mysterious Benedict Society by Trenton Lee Stewart:
Join a group of gifted children on a mission to save the world, solving puzzles and facing mind-bending challenges.

result.name: The Secret Garden by Frances Hodgson Burnett
result.description:
The Secret Garden by Frances Hodgson Burnett:
Follow Mary Lennox's journey as she discovers a hidden, magical garden and transforms the lives of those around her.

result.name: Stuart Little
result.description:
Stuart Little by E.B. White:
Join Stuart Little, a small mouse with a big heart, on his adventurous journey through the world of humans and animals.

result.name: Charlotte's Web
result.description:
Charlotte's Web by E.B. White:
Discover the enduring friendship between a pig named Wilbur and a spider named Charlotte.

result.name: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
result.description:
Diary of a Wimpy Kid series by Jeff Kinney:
Laugh along with Greg Heffley's humorous and relatable middle school escapades.

result.name: The Magic Tree House
result.description:
The Magic Tree House series by Mary Pope Osborne:
Siblings Jack and Annie embark on magical adventures through time and space in a mysterious treehouse.

result.name: Nate the Great
result.description:
Nate the Great series by Marjorie Weinman Sharmat:
Join detective Nate as he solves mysteries with his trusty dog, Sludge, using wit and observation.

result.name: Where the Red Fern Grows
result.description:
Where the Red Fern Grows by Wilson Rawls:
Follow the heartwarming journey of a boy and his two loyal dogs in the Ozark Mountains.

result.name: Coraline
result.description:
"Coraline" by Neil Gaiman:
Coraline discovers a parallel world that seems perfect, but things take a dark turn in this eerie and imaginative tale.

result.name: The Call of the Wild
result.description:
"The Call of the Wild" by Jack London

Description: Join Buck, a domestic dog turned wild, as he navigates the harsh Alaskan wilderness during the Klondike Gold Rush.

result.name: Around the World in Eighty Days
result.description:
"Around the World in Eighty Days" by Jules Verne

Description: Join Phileas Fogg and his servant Passepartout as they attempt to circumnavigate the globe in just eighty days.

result.name: The Jungle Book
result.description:
"The Jungle Book" by Rudyard Kipling

Description: Follow Mowgli, a young boy raised by wolves in the jungle, as he encounters various animals and learns valuable life lessons.

result.name: The Swiss Family Robinson
result.description:
"The Swiss Family Robinson" by Johann David Wyss

Description: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, the Robinson family uses resourcefulness and teamwork to survive and thrive.

result.name: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
result.description:
"The Adventures of Tom Sawyer" by Mark Twain

Description: Follow the mischievous and imaginative Tom Sawyer as he embarks on various adventures along the Mississippi River.

result.name: A Wrinkle in Time
result.description:
"A Wrinkle in Time" by Madeleine L'Engle

Description: Meg Murry, along with her brother and friend, embarks on a cosmic journey to rescue her father from an evil force.

result.name: I, Robot
result.description:
"I, Robot" by Isaac Asimov

Description: Explore a collection of interconnected short stories that delve into the relationship between humans and intelligent robots.

result.name: Ender's Game
result.description:
"Ender's Game" by Orson Scott Card

Description: In a future where gifted children are trained for war, follow the story of Ender Wiggin as he prepares to face an alien threat.

result.name: The Giver
result.description:
"The Giver" by Lois Lowry

Description: In a seemingly utopian society, Jonas discovers the dark truths behind his world and must make a difficult choice.

result.name: The War of the Worlds
result.description:
"The War of the Worlds" by H.G. Wells

Description: Witness the invasion of Earth by Martians and the struggle for survival in this classic science fiction novel.

result.name: The Time Machine
result.description:
"The Time Machine" by H.G. Wells

Description: Join the Time Traveller on a journey into the distant future, exploring the evolution of humanity and encountering strange civilizations.

result.name: The Hobbit
result.description: The Hobbit by J.R.R. Tolkien: Follow Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit with a taste for comfort, as he unexpectedly joins a group of dwarves on a quest to reclaim a stolen treasure guarded by the dragon Smaug.

result.name: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone Part 1
result.description: Harry Potter, an eleven-year-old orphan, discovers that he is a wizard and is invited to study at Hogwarts. Even as he escapes a dreary life and enters a world of magic, he finds trouble awaiting him.

result.name: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone Part 2
result.description: Harry Potter, an eleven-year-old orphan, discovers that he is a wizard and is invited to study at Hogwarts. Even as he escapes a dreary life and enters a world of magic, he finds trouble awaiting him.
